description: unique ID for each game
date of game
team unique ID
2-Point Field Goal Attempt: Shots taken inside the 3-point line.
2-Point Field Goals Made: Successful shots made inside the 3-point line
3-Point Field Goal Attempt: Shots attempted beyond the 3-point arc
3-Point Field Goal Attempt: Shots attempted beyond the 3-point arc
Free Throw Attempt: Number of free throws a player takes.
Free Throws Made: Successful free throws made.
A pass leading directly to a made basket.
Block: Deflecting or stopping an opponent's shot attempt.
Steals: Gaining possession by intercepting or taking the ball from an opponent.
Turnover: Losing possession due to mistakes or opponent actions.
team TOV
Defensive Rebound: Securing the ball after a missed shot by the opponent.
Offensive Rebound: Recovering the ball after a missed shot by a teammate.
Foul - personal
Foul - technical
total point at end of game
Total point at end of game for opponnent
The largest point lead at any point in the game
Not a D1 Team
length in Min of OT
days since previous game. First game of season is reported as NA
reports attendance at game (some games have missing fields)
Time zone difference from home stadium
distance from previous game
venue of game. Home=1; Away=-1; Neutral site=0
travel distance from home stadium to venue
